name: nft_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nft_api_news.
Tool description: This NFT API will keep you up to date on the NFT space. Built for effeciency.
API description: This is where you get all the up to date NFT news. This is a live feed and is updated daily.

nftnews.description: A specific filter to narrow down NFT news. Default is None, meaning no specific filter.
